name: Warden

auras.raw_description: Increases Ally HP in the Arena by 30%.

skills.name: Deathmark
skills.raw_description:
Attacks 1 enemy. Has a 40% chance of placing a 15% [Weaken] debuff for 1 turn. Damage inflicted is proportional to DEF.
Damage based on: [DEF]
Lvl. 2 Damage +5%
Lvl. 3 Buff/Debuff Chance +10%
Lvl. 4 Damage +5%
Lvl. 5 Buff/Debuff Chance +10%
Lvl. 6 Buff/Debuff Chance +20%
Lvl. 7 Damage +10%
Lvl. 8 Buff/Debuff Chance +20%

skills.name: Rending Flames
skills.raw_description:
Attacks all enemies. Has a 50% chance of placing a 25% [Decrease ATK] debuff for 2 turns. Places a 30% [Increase DEF] buff on all allies for 2 turns. Damage inflicted is proportional to DEF.
Damage based on: [DEF]
Lvl. 2 Damage +10%
Lvl. 3 Buff/Debuff Chance +5%
Lvl. 4 Buff/Debuff Chance +5%
Lvl. 5 Buff/Debuff Chance +10%
Lvl. 6 Damage +10%
Lvl. 7 Cooldown -1

skills.name: Wall of Thorns
skills.raw_description:
Places a 30% [Reflect Damage] buff on all allies for 2 turns.
Lvl. 2 Damage +5%
Lvl. 3 Damage +5%
Lvl. 4 Damage +10%
Lvl. 5 Cooldown -1
Lvl. 6 Cooldown -1
Lvl. 7 Cooldown -1
